thread.title: Porsche names Oliver Blume new CEO
thread.title_full: Porsche names Oliver Blume new CEO

author: cnbc.com
title: Porsche names Oliver Blume new CEO
text:
Bernd Weissbrod | AFP | Getty Images Oliver Blume named new CEO of Porsche. Volkswagen 's Porsche business said its supervisory board has named Oliver Blume as its new chief executive, replacing Matthias Mueller, who has taken the helm at its parent company.
Volkswagen scandal: Everything you need to know Porsche production chief Blume, 47, will start his new job on Oct. 1, Porsche said in a statement on Wednesday.
A person familiar with the matter had told Reuters on Tuesday that the sports car-maker would name Blume as its new CEO on Wednesday.
